Title: A Midwife's Story.

Authors: Penny Armstrong;Sheryl Feldman.

Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=hnbrAwAAQBAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&edge=curl&source=gbs_api.
Description: When hospital-trained midwife Penny Armstrong takes on a job delivering the babies of the Amish, she discovers an approach to giving birth which would change her life forever. A Midwife's Story is a life-affirming book that never fails to enlighten, inform and surprise. Honest and ultimately very moving, it is inspirational reading for all student midwives and expectant parents..
